venue.name: Center for Digital Imaging Arts at Boston University

item.description:
Tuesday, November 17, 2009
6:00 PM-10:00 PM

Boston University: Center for Digital Imaging Arts
274 Moody St.
Waltham, MA 02453

Cost: Free to CIPNE Members Guests 10.00

Spread your Marketing Message
Facebook more than just a cool hangout, LinkedIn more than a stodgy resume placeholder. Learn how to get business from both! Lecture by Laura Briere


Learn all about social media marketing from a renowned marketing expert. As seen on Fox News, and throughout the internet, Laura Briere of Visions Advertising is the authority on social media marketing in the Bay State. She is frequently published in business magazines, lectures about marketing, and teaches business owners the ins and outs of social media management as well as many other marketing topics.

Now YOU can learn how to do it yourself, direct from the very best. Come learn how to manage Facebook and LinkedIn and how to get these tools to produce more leads, and more business for you, without investing a dime into either one.

In this unique opportunity, Laura will focus on the challenges photographers face in the social media world, as well as general marketing challenges, and provide instruction on proven methods to approaching social media as a photographer. Don't miss this lecture - you'll regret it if you do!

LOCATION
Center for Digital Imaging Arts
274 Moody Street
Waltham, MA 02453

Registration: 6:00 7:00pm
Program: 7:00 10:00pm

Cost: CIPNE Members, Free; Guests, $10; Full-time Students*, $5.

*Full-time students will be required to present their photo-IDs at registration.

Pre-registration is required for this program.
Click here to register (Non-members may pay by PayPal)
Please note: on-line registration closes November 13th.
More Information: Website: http://www.cipne.org/...
E-mail: scott@erbphoto.com
Entered by: Donna Dufault

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Spread your Marketing Message Facebook is More than Just a Cool Hangout Place
